name: Fundumental Point Defense Integration
desc:
Gives all small non-missile weapons the ability to automatically target incoming enemy missiles and to identify - and ignore - decoy flares. Targeting missiles takes priority over targeting enemy ships or fighters.

In addition, all point-defense weapons get the best possible target leading, regardless of combat readiness, and all damage to missiles is increased by %s. On top of this, all point-defense weapons gain a range extension of %s.

name: Structural Weakness
desc: Armor plates will explode when these explode;.

desc: Extends the range of all non-PD weapons by %s.

name: Projected Solar Shielding
desc:
Utilizes p-space to establish a thin baryon field around the ship's fighters, reducing the effect a star's corona may have on the fighter by %s. 

In combat, reduces the energy damage fighters take by %s.
sModDesc: Increases the protection from solar coronae and similar hazards to %s.

name: Warlord's Warship
desc:
This ship is a frankensteined abomination of different ship components, haphazard modifications, and strange decisions - yet somehow, they all fit together perfectly (even if it makes your engineers pass out in fright). Internal markings (and the occasional bloodstain) paint a clear picture: This was once, and maybe still is, a %s of the %s, with all expense being made to turn it into a proper battlewagon of war. 

The internal shield generator has somehow been replaced by a full-size X03, increasing shield efficiency by %s, reducing shield EMP arc chance by %s, and increasing shield arc by %s.
A second atlas's flux vent-line has been daisy-chained, increasing flux dissipation by %s.
The retrofitted ATC has been optimized using some sort of gravitic targetting computer, increasing non-missile weapon range by %s.
Walls have been torn down in order to fit more missiles, increasing missile weapon ammo capacity by %s.
The engines have been overpowered via auxillary AM injectors, significantly increasing acceleration and deceleration speed.

All these modifications have been made with absolutely zero respect to the structure of the ship. It should be fine under normal operation, but hull integrity is reduced by %s and armor rating reduced by %s.

name: Subsumed Intelligence
desc: A terrifying machine intelligance has seized control of this ship's AI inhabitants.
